description:
The pre-opening event is a huge success, but Shizuka`s concerns are also revealed as the event ends. Her father will only allow her to work as an idol while she`s in middle school, but the producer understands Shizuka`s desire to continue being an idol. Finally, the producer announces a press conference will be held for the MILLIONSTARS` debut.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Dream Gets Rolling: Live Theater Project!
動き出す夢 ライブシアタープロジェクト!
